summary: The diff adds a new authenticated Receive screen that derives and displays the user’s ICP Ledger Account ID from the current Internet Identity Principal, adds in-app navigation/routing to reach it (including wiring Dashboard navigation), and implements copy-to-clipboard with visible success feedback and English guidance text for exchange deposits. One unrelated change appears to have been made to HistoryPage (timestamp type fix) that wasn’t requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Unrequested fix to History page timestamp typing/formatting (mentioned as a timestamp type error fix).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on adding a Receive screen, navigation wiring, account-id derivation utility, and deposit guidance. A HistoryPage timestamp bug fix is not part of REQ-11 through REQ-14.
